contents.name: VIN
contents.description: 17-character Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) as defined by ISO 3779

contents.name: WMI
contents.description: 3-character World Manufacturer Identification (WMI) as defined by ISO 3780

contents.name: IgnitionOn
contents.description: Indicates whether the vehicle ignition is on or off. sensor, boolean, true = on, false = off

contents.name: IgnitionOnTime
contents.description: Telemetry, Accumulated ignition on time in seconds. sensor, unit in seconds

contents.name: IgnitionOffTime
contents.description: Telemetry, Accumulated ignition off time in seconds. sensor, unit in seconds

contents.name: DriveTime
contents.description: Telemetry, Accumulated drive time in seconds. sensor, unit in seconds

contents.name: IdleTime
contents.description: Telemetry, Accumulated idle time in seconds, sensor, unit in seconds

contents.name: Speed
contents.description: Telemetry, Vehicle speed, as sensed by the gearbox. sensor, min -250, max 250, km/h

contents.name: Acceleration_Longitudinal
contents.description: Telemetry, Vehicle acceleration in X (longitudinal acceleration). sensor, unit in m/s2

contents.name: Acceleration_Lateral
contents.description: Telemetry, Vehicle acceleration in Y (lateral acceleration). sensor, unit in m/s2

contents.name: Acceleration_Vertical
contents.description: Telemetry, Vehicle acceleration in Z (vertical acceleration). sensor, unit in seconds

contents.name: AngularVelocity_Roll
contents.description: Telemetry, Vehicle rotation rate along X (longitudinal). sensor, unit in degrees/s

contents.name: AngularVelocity_Pitch
contents.description: Telemetry, Vehicle Rotation in Y (Pitch Rotation). sensor, unit in degrees/s

contents.name: AngularVelocity_Yaw
contents.description: Telemetry, Vehicle Rotation in Z (Yaw Rotation). unit in degrees/s
